name: Everlast Airstyler Ceramic Blow Dryer & Multi Styler Tool
about: What it is: A multi-styler to style while you dry with six ceramic attachments to dry, curl, wave, and smooth with everlasting hold...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.- Hold and Style Extending.- Straightening and Smoothing..Key Benefits: - Creates voluminous blowouts.- Multi-use hair tool.- Ceramic attachments for everlasting hold..What Else You Need to Know: The Everlast Airstyler creates salon worthy blowouts and locks your styles into place, all thanks to the ceramic blow dryer brush and curling attachments. They’re your secret weapon and heat up evenly to help set your look, plus add shine and reduce frizz...This Set Contains: - Smoothing Dryer Concentrator (to blow dry with a brush, smooth hair, or tame flyaways).- Angled Dryer Concentrator (to dry hair from roots to ends).- 2 x Ceramic Air-Wrap Curlers (to achieve effortless curls that last with interchangeable air direction so you can easily curl hair on both sides).- Ceramic Round Brush (to achieve a more defined wave; great for shorter hair that still wants volume).- Ceramic Volumizing Round Brush (to achieve salon-quality bouncy waves or a sleek and smooth look)..
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Use the Angled Dryer to rough dry hair 90 percent before styling with the brush or curling attachments..-Use the Smoothing Concentrator to dry and smooth before styling with the brush or curling attachments..-Use the 1.25

Ceramic Volumizing Round Brush for a voluminous salon finish—it’s also great for medium to long lengths..-Use the two Ceramic Curlers to style hair in both directions...Pro tip: .-Turn off heat settings for cool air to set styles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: With this product being very affordable it was an easy buy! I tried all the settings and each one works great. For reference I have think hair. Typically these type of stylers require a very high heat setting, but this one did not. Mt curls lasted the day. Very impressed by this product. Love this whole brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ONLY hair styler that gives my straight thin hair the body i’m looking for. It gives that new blow out/ Sabrina Carpenter look and half the time. I could not be more impressed. And that’s just talking about ONE of the things it does. That does include the other round brush/ blow dryer options. It’s a great all-in-all hair styler that is GOOD for your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Bondiboost Everlast Airstyler for 6 weeks. I LOVE it! It does take a few times to get the hang of it. Be sure to use cool blast - it will set your curls and makes it easier to change out tools. Also, hold tools at the base of the tool when adding or removing. The tightness of the curl doesn't hold for long but the volume is AMAZING and my hair looks good all day. If you're looking for precision curls that last all day, get a different tool. If you want an amazing, voluminous, salon style blow out tool, I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it! Took my hair from wet to styled in no time at all. I love that it comes with every tool you need plus the bag! It’s lightweight, user friendly and the price point is way more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A holy grail product! I’ve been trying to get the hang of mastering the perfect blowout and this Airstyler did not disappoint. I love the different attachments it comes with so you can switch up looks and take your time learning how to use each one. Worth the price tag in my opinion. 10/10 recommend!!!

reviews.review_text: Amazing product!! Great for styling!! I love all the attachments!!

The Bondi Boost Everlast Airstyler is a fantastic option if you’re looking for high-quality results at a more affordable price point. It’s incredibly easy to use and takes your hair from wet to fully styled quickly.  The design feels sturdy and well-made, so it’s clear this tool is built to last. It’s versatile enough to create sleek, smooth styles or add volume and bounce—whatever look you’re going for.  This would also make a great gift for anyone who loves styling their hair or just wants to simplify their routine. Overall, it’s an excellent value and delivers professional-level results without the hefty price tag.  Love love love!!!

reviews.review_text: I am LOVING this tool !! It comes with 6 attachments, and so far, I've been able to use all of them. It is a great price for its value, and it has easily become one of my most used hair tools. It is very versatile and it has replaced the need for regular curling irons and hair dryers that take up too much room in my bathroom anyway. It comes in a cute bag with compartments for the attachments. Honestly, this tool has made my mornings go a lot faster and I have been able to get ready in almost half the time it used to take me. The tool is a must-have in my routine!!

I love all of the components and cute bag that this airstyler tool comes with! I first begin by blow drying my hair with the blow dryer tool until it’s about 80% dry. Then, I’ll use the comb if I want a straight look or I’ll use the airstyler wrap tool for curls. I appreciate how this hair tool gives you the optional to use cool air or heat to dry or style your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don’t write reviews, but I returned this product, and want to give my thoughts if it’s helpful for others   Backstory: was interested in the Dyson, then Shark, but couldn’t justify the cost. I have T3’s curlers and DryBars dry brush, so I had the individual tools.   Sephora Rouge Sale, I saw the Bondi with great stars, could buy it for $150, so I immediately pulled the trigger.   Initially: I loved it. I could blow dry my hair in 5 minutes and do a quick blow out in 10-15 minutes.  Additional thoughts: The appliance itself felt cheap compared to my T3, but I had no frame of reference for airstylers.  I hated how hot the styler attachments got, I had to use my hot pad to remove them/put new ones on (like the different direction barrels).  The curls do not last, but I really liked the circular brush/blow out style I was getting, so was still happy. The air suction isn’t strong, whatsoever. I don’t know the numerics of my hair type, but I am a natural blonde, very fine hair, slightly wavy, but it is very thick and quite long (natural waist maybe?). The air suction on the curlers would barely pick up any of my hair, I truly can’t imagine how it would work on coarser hair. I’m talking 1/3-1/2 of the hair I’d normally section/curl with my iron. Then, I was using the circular brush, and the whole attachment snapped off. In investigating, the plastic of the the connection would get so hot that it would bend the plastic — making the attachments unusable.   I returned it, and generally was super bummed but glad it broke within the month, so I could get my money back. Amazon Black Friday, I spent the $70 more to get the Shark on sale. Immediately, the appliance is more sturdy, substantial and feels quality. Dried my roots in 1 minute, root to tip in 4 min, and curled in an additional 9 min. No troubles with the heat of attachments, air suction/strength, etc. I would highly recommend saving until the Shark is in budget!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the tool but it broke after two months (locking mechanism cracked), I got a direct replacement from bondi boost and the same issue occurred again after two months. Save your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted an airstyler,  but I just can't spend Dyson or Shark prices, so I got this during the Sephora sale with my VIB discount. I LOVE this. My hair routine has been cut by 3/4 of the time. I was using Lange Airflow Straightener and curler before. This replaces that, plus my hairdryer. The curls last forever!!! It was easy to use with the Left and Right barrels.  I LOVE being able to dry my hair with this!!! I've never used Dyson or Shark, so I can't compare, but for the price, my hair is looking and feeling amazing!!! Time will tell if it lasts...crossing my fingers that it does. For now, it gets 5 stars.

reviews.review_title: Why didn’t I buy this sooner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Bondi Boost Everlast Airstyler and it’s been such a game-changer for my thick hair. It dries and styles in one step, saving me time and effort, which has made it an easy addition to my daily routine. The lightweight design makes it comfortable to use, and the ionic technology keeps my hair smooth and frizz-free, even with all the volume I get from the round brush attachment. It leaves my hair bouncy and healthy-looking. If you have thick hair and need a tool that cuts down on styling time without sacrificing results, this is definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_title: Handy- great to keep your counter clear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A handy tool to have. The Everlast airstyler is a great thing to have for travel and when you want the convenience of more than one tool, all in one! The curls held up at my event all night, even after getting damp. The hair dryer attachments are great and versatile, and my hand doesn’t cramp up when using it to blow dry (iykyk!) My only complaint is that my curls aren’t as neat as when I use my regular curler, due to the fact that I have breakage and new growth that gets blown around, so if you have finer hair with lots of varying lengths it takes a while to make it work for you. All in all a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hair Dryer is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a fast, efficient, and gentle dryer. It features multiple heat and speed settings, ionic technology that reduces frizz and adds shine, and a lightweight, ergonomic design for easy handling. It's surprisingly quiet, dries hair quickly, and is durable, with a long cord for added convenience. Overall, it’s a great investment for smoother, healthier hair with less frizz and quicker drying times. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: Perfect Dyson dupe for way cheaper
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It comes with many attachments that are very easy to put on and take off. I have thick wavy hair and they are all very suitable for it. My curls lasted almost all day long. It is a little bit of a learning curve to figure out how to use some of the pieces but well worth it. My only complaint is that some of the pieces get very very hot so if you want to use more than one attachment sometimes you have to wait for it to cool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The BondiBoost Everlast Airstyler Ceramic Blow Dryer & Multi Styler Tool is like a personal glam squad for your hair! This tool gives serious salon vibes right at home, combining the power of a blow dryer with the versatility of multiple styling tools. Its ceramic technology helps smooth, add shine, and reduce frizz, all while protecting hair from heat damage. Whether you’re going for sleek and straight or bouncy curls, it’s got the attachments you need to make it happen—and it does it all in record time. If you’re ready to take your hair game up a notch (or five), the Everlast Airstyler is a must-have for effortlessly fabulous results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried out the Bondi Boost Everlast Airstyler, and I’m beyond impressed! It combines the functions of a hairdryer and styling tool in one, making it perfect for anyone who loves a quick, polished blowout without the need for multiple devices. The design is sleek and lightweight, making it easy to handle for those longer styling sessions. The styling brush attachments are great for achieving volume, and I loved how easily I could create both straight and bouncy styles. The bristles are gentle on the hair, yet effective at gripping without tugging, so the styling experience felt comfortable. Plus, it’s designed with a cool-shot feature, which helped set the style and add that extra shine.

I tried rough drying and then using the wands to curl, my hair wouldn't wrap around the barrels even when I guided it on. Tried the brush attachments to see if I could get those to work and they barely dried my hair, definitely did not add any curl. The dryer portion is not nearly as good as my drybar hairdryer. I also tried to use on dry hair and the same result. I'll be returning it unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this Airstyler as a lower cost alternative to the Shark and Dyson.  Unfortunately, after 4 months of light use (no dropping it, not travelling, using it 2 a week) in interior connector has broken.  As a result, the attachments are no longer locking and are wobbly to use.  Having read some of the recent reviews, it looks like this is a common issue.    In terms of functionality, I was really happy with it.  It dried my hair quickly and was great for a low key blowout.  It clearly, however, is not built to last.  I contacted Sephora and as it is outside the 60 return window, there is nothing they can do.  Strongly don't recommend.  You are better off paying more once than having to buy twice.

reviews.review_title: The cool setting is the best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before and after photos shown. Before is air dried, no product. After is using Bondi Boost procapil, primer, heat protectant (before styler) and bond repair oil (after styler).  1st, it is longer but lighter than the Revlon round brush styler, my arms did not get tired using the everlast. I only used the 2 brush attachments. I let my hair dry in a microfiber towel for about 15 minutes before using this styler, and then that part took me about 30 minutes. My hair still has its curl, but is smoother. There are 3 fan speeds and really 4 heat settings - no lights on that side is cool, then 3 settings with heat. I used the medium fan and medium heat to dry, then the cool setting. The cool setting is actually cool. I've used other dryers and stylers where cool is just room temperature. This setting is actually refreshing, which is amazing because doing my hair makes me sweat.   Pros: excellent cool shot, lightweight, longer handle, carry bag with hook! Cons: attachments I won't use

reviews.review_text: I own the Dyson Airwrap but decided to give the BondiBoost Airstyler a try since it was half the price—and honestly, it’s such an incredible dupe! One of the standout features is the ceramic design, which really helps my hair feel shinier and smoother after styling. I was initially concerned about potential heat damage, but the temperature is just right—it doesn’t feel too hot on my hair, but it’s still warm enough to hold a curl.   Another thing I love about the BondiBoost Airstyler is the versatility. It comes with a round brush and blow-dryer attachment. The attachments are easy to swap, and they glide through my hair without tugging. And it's lightweight and easy to pack in the travel back.   For half the price of the Dyson, the Bondiboost Everlast is such a great alternative :)

With six detachable heads, I can switch up my style every day, from big, bouncy curls to sleek, shiny waves. The ceramic attachments heat up evenly, so my hair always looks smooth and frizz-free, and the best part? My style actually lasts all day, no touch-ups needed. It’s perfect for any hair type, and at this price, it’s a total steal. Just remember, it’s a US-only deal, so keep it stateside!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have only tried this out once so far, but I am already so excited! I’m new to using Air Styling wands, but it was easy to use and gave me the prettiest loose curls. It’s a little bit of a learning curve if you have never used something like this. Once you get the hang of it, the attachments kind of do a lot of the work for you which is awesome. (Definitely make sure you section off your hair to save time and sanity.)  First go, it only took me an hour from out of the shower to the photo attached, but once I get the full swing of things, I think I will be able to style my hair in thirty minutes with this! (Important to note for reference: My hair is stick straight and flat normally; individual hairs are thin, but there’s a lot of them.) Only negative so far is I wish the 32mm attachment was a little smaller. That would make it perfect for bangs and getting closer to the root. The Rough Dry attachment is going to replace the need for my regular hairdryer. It dried my hair so fast and with no frizzies. The only attachment I didn’t use was the Dry + Smooth one, as I didn’t really have a need for it.   If you are in the market for something like this, I think the Everlast Styler is for sure worth checking out, especially comparing its price point to others I have seen. I can’t wait to incorporate this into my hair routine!

reviews.review_title: my new go-to for achieving salon-worthy hair
reviews.review_text: I have thick, curly, and frizzy hair, so finding a styling tool that can tame it while giving me the flexibility to create different looks has always been a challenge. Enter the BondiBoost Everlast Airstyler - my new go-to for achieving salon-worthy hair at home. My favorite style is creating soft, bouncy waves, which the curling attachment handles like a dream.  What really makes the Everlast Airstyler stand out is its versatility. For one sweet price, you get six styling tools in one—everything from a dryer to volumizing brushes and curling attachments. It's every girl’s wish come true!  If you're looking to boost your look and boost your feel-good energy, the BondiBoost Everlast Airstyler is a game-changer!

reviews.review_title: Not wowed. I purchased this. Nice concept though.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my birthday. Be nice to yourself once in a while. I'm 64 now. I have long hair. Never dyed. I do have some natural wave to it. As of this review all ratings are 5 stars. This looked too good to be true. It is. But i plowed ahead and smothered any doubts and purchased it.  Nice little carrying case it comes in. Even extra compartments for a couple of thin or small items. You could actually use this case for makeup when traveling. It would work great for that too.  The noise level was great.  The round brush is not for my long hair. It does not replace a round brush and blow dryer. It creates fly-aways and it is nowhere near as good as a regular round brush and blow dryer.  The bigger blow out brush. Eeek. It creates even more fly-away hair. I found a lack of control and ease of use I get using this compared to a round brush and blow dryer. And the end results of this brush took way too long and unhappy results.  The angled? dryer. Wow I did not like this. Stand in front of a floor fan on high speed and you get the same result. No control. It does not replace my regular blow dryer.  The  smooth dryer concentrator I really did not like it. It's cumbersome to maneuver. It causes way too much work to get a result. Caused me major flyaways. I had to hold it in such a way that I asked myself why did I buy this?  The air-wraps. They do wrap the hair. The air coming out made my hair fly around a bit until it wraps. The curl looks great at first. But was almost gone before I finished. Strange.  I'm not going to return it. I'll keep working with it before I give it away to a sister. But first I'm going to cut off about of foot or more of hair and see what the wraps do then.  After each use they get hot! Be careful when changing.  I'm sure this works for some people. It does not work for me. I have to put in far too much effort to get a blow out with a sleek mane I achieve with a round brush and blow dryer. I never achieved it with this. Good concept though!

reviews.review_text: The design is sleek and ergonomic, making it easy to handle and maneuver while styling.The ceramic barrel not only speeds up drying time but also distributes heat evenly, preventing any hot spots that could damage hair. The bristles are gentle yet effective, detangling my hair effortlessly as I blow-dry.  I used to spend ages with a separate brush and blow dryer, but now I can achieve salon-worthy results in half the time. Whether I'm going for smooth and sleek or voluminous styles, the Everlast Airstyler delivers every time.  Another thing I love is the versatility of this tool. It's not just a blow dryer brush – I can also use it to straighten or curl my hair, making it perfect for creating different looks without needing multiple styling tools cluttering up my bathroom.  Overall, the BondiBoost Everlast Airstyler Ceramic Blow Dryer Brush has exceeded my expectations in every way. It's efficient, versatile, and leaves my hair looking and feeling amazing. I can't recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this hair tool system! It’s perfect for my everyday hair styling. Plus it’s so easy to take the base and an attachment or two with me on trips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the Everlast! So easy to use and my hair looked amazing after. It totally helped with frizz and I love that it’s a fraction of the price of the Dyson air wrap.

I'd been wanting to purchase the Dyson Airwrap for a while now but couldn't justify the cost. When I found the Bondi Boost Everlast Airstyler my dreams came true! ✨️ I have naturally pin straight hair so getting my hair to hold a curl is close to impossible, but with the Everlast Airstyler it was no problem! I love that I can use it on wet or dry hair and the results are consistently amazing. The fact that it comes with so many components to achieve multiple hair styles and is less than $200 is my favorite part. The heat vs. cold options work great. The only thing I wish they had was a heat protective glove included because the tools do get pretty hot when changing them out from styling the left and right side. Overall, really amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So, I have both the Dyson and this one. Both are amazing products! Something I love about this product though is that it holds my curl for WAY LONGER because it gets a lot hotter than my Dyson. For that reason and the price, I vote this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this after I wash my hair and it gives my hair the best volume and style! It’s super easy to use and I love the travel case it comes with.

reviews.review_title: Bought this instead of the dyson
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this tool! Everything I need in 1. Takes some practice but once you get the hang of it, it will replace all your other tools. Such a good price point for the good quality. 10/10!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This airstyler is amazing! I was obsessed with how it made my hair look and it comes in the cutest little bag so you can take it on the go! It’s great quality and perfect for days when you don’t want to spend hours on your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: Beyond obsessed. I have tried other tools, but this one doesn’t even come close. I love how I can switch out different attachments for different looks. Buy it- you won’t regret

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Everlast Airstyler for months now and I absolutely love how my hair has improved.  My hair was damaged from heating tools I used to use, but I have noticed a substantial difference.  I use the  Angled Dryer to do my initial dry. Then I use the Smoothing Concentrator to dry and smooth before styling with the 2.25 Ceramic Volumizing Round Brush I finish with the cool air to set my look. The Everlast Airstyler has helped to reduce damage and leaves my hair soft and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Dyson airwrap but the BondiBoost airwrap actually curls my hair better. I will say the air is so strong that it becomes a bit chaotic but it always turns out great. I also love the travel bag that it comes with! The heat is never too intense either so I don’t feel like I’m damaging my hair. The blowout is honesty even better after a night of sleeping on it. Highly recommend for a quick and easy blowout.
